input_email_body:
Subject: Discrepancies in Subscription Billing Need Resolution

I am encountering discrepancies in my subscription billing payments. The issue might be due to incorrect payment processing through Xero My name is Elena Ivanova.. After re-verifying my account details and reprocessing payments, the problem still persists. I would greatly appreciate your assistance in resolving this matter as soon as possible You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. Could you please inform me of the next steps to take in order to resolve the issue? I am looking forward to hearing back from you soon.
